price: HUENDA ikawa walio kufuru wakatamani wange kuwa Waislamu.
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: Watapenda, na watatamani sana makafiri wanao zikanya Aya za Mwenyezi Mungu Subhanahu wa Taa'la, watapo ona adhabu ya Siku ya Kiyama, lau kuwa walisilimu walipo kuwapo duniani, na wakafuata kwa ikhlasi Dini ya Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: rubamā yawaddu alladhīna kafarū law kānū mus'limīna
